problem_names:
lemma vwalkI_subgraph:
  assumes "vwalk p H"
  assumes "subgraph H G"
  shows "vwalk p G"

lemma vpathI_subgraph:
  assumes "vpath p G"
  assumes "subgraph G H"
  shows "vpath p H"

lemma (in loopfree_digraph) vpathI_arc:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> arcs_ends G"
  shows "vpath [a,b] G"
translations:
lemma vwalkI_subgraph:
  assumes "vwalk p H"
  assumes "subgraph H G"
  shows "vwalk p G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vwalk p G
proof

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. set p \<subseteq> verts G
 2. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
 3. p \<noteq> []
show "set p \<subseteq> verts G" and "p \<noteq> []"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set p \<subseteq> verts G &&& p \<noteq> []
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  vwalk p H
  subgraph H G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set p \<subseteq> verts G &&& p \<noteq> []
by (auto simp add: subgraph_def vwalk_def)

proof (state)
this:
  set p \<subseteq> verts G
  p \<noteq> []

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
have "set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends H"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends H
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  vwalk p H
  subgraph H G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends H
by (simp add: vwalk_def)

proof (state)
this:
  set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
also

proof (state)
this:
  set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
have "\<dots> \<subseteq> arcs_ends G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arcs_ends H \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
using \<open>subgraph H G\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  subgraph H G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arcs_ends H \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
by (rule arcs_ends_mono)

proof (state)
this:
  arcs_ends H \<subseteq> arcs_ends G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G
show "set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G

proof (state)
this:
  set (vwalk_arcs p) \<subseteq> arcs_ends G

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma vpathI_subgraph:
  assumes "vpath p G"
  assumes "subgraph G H"
  shows "vpath p H"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vpath p H
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  vpath p G
  subgraph G H

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vpath p H
by (auto intro: vwalkI_subgraph)

lemma (in loopfree_digraph) vpathI_arc:
  assumes "(a,b) \<in> arcs_ends G"
  shows "vpath [a,b] G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vpath [a, b] G
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<rightarrow> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. vpath [a, b] G
by (intro vpathI vwalkI) (auto intro: adj_in_verts adj_not_same)
end
